import math
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(100000)
# 11000000
def go(l, r, a, b, total, game_round):
    m = (l+r)//2
    
    if l <= a <= m and m+1 <= b <= r: # ì„œë¡œ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ê·¸ë£¹ì´ë©´
        return total-game_round
    elif l <= a <= m and l <= b <= m: # ì™¼ìª½ ê·¸ë£¹ ì´ë©´
        return go(l, m, a, b, total, game_round+1)
    else:
        return go(m+1, r, a, b, total, game_round+1)
        

def solution(n,a,b):
    c = a if a < b else b
    d = a if a > b else b
    total_round = int(math.log2(n))
    return go(1, n, c, d, total_round, 0)

def solution(n,a,b):
    count = 0
    while a != b:
        a = (a+1) // 2
        b = (b+1) // 2
        count += 1
    return count

def lower_bound(a, v): # vì´í•˜ ìµœëŒ€ ì¸ë±ìŠ¤
  left = 0
  right = len(a)
  print("left right mid value action")
  while left < right:
    temp = []
    mid = (left+right)//2
    temp.extend(list(map(str, [left, right, mid, v])))
    
    if a[mid] < v:
      left = mid + 1
      temp.append(f'update left to {mid+1}')
    else:
      right = mid
      temp.append(f'update right to {mid}')
    print("     ".join(temp))
  return right

ì²˜ìŒì—ëŠ” ê°ê°ì˜ orderì˜ ë©”ë‰´ì™€ ë‹¤ìŒ ë©”ë‰´ì™€ì˜ êµì§‘í•©ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ì„œ í’€ë ¤ê³  í–ˆìœ¼ë‚˜ ë¬¸ì œëŠ”, ê²°êµ­ ëª‡ë²ˆ ì‹œì¼°ëŠ”ì§€ ì•Œì•„ë‚´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤ëŠ” ì ì—ì„œ ë§‰í˜”ë‹¤. ê·¸ë˜ì„œ combinationì„ í†µí•´ ëª¨ë“  course ê°œìˆ˜ë§Œí¼ì˜ ì¡°í•©ì„ êµ¬í•˜ê³  ì´ë¥¼ ì„¸ì–´ì„œ dictionaryì— ì €ì¥í•œ í›„ countë¥¼ ê¸°ë°˜ìœ¼ë¡œ sortingí•˜ì—¬ ê°€ì¥ ë§ì´ ì„ íƒëœ ë…€ì„ì„ ì •ë‹µ ë°°ì—´ì— ë„£ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§„í–‰í–ˆë‹¤.

from itertools import combinations

def solution(orders, course):
    answer = []
    
    for c in course:
        temp = []
        counter = dict()
        for o in orders:
            temp.extend(list(combinations(sorted(o), c)))
        
        A = set(temp)
        for a in A:
            counter[a] = temp.count(a)
        
        counter = sorted(counter.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
        answer.extend(["".join(list(x[0])) for x in counter if x[1] > 1 and x[1] == counter[0][1]])
    
    answer = sorted(answer)
    return answer

ê·¼ë° ëˆ„ê°€ Counterë¼ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ì—ˆë‹¤.

import collections
import itertools

def solution(orders, course):
    result = []

    for course_size in course:
        order_combinations = []
        for order in orders:
            order_combinations += itertools.combinations(sorted(order), course_size)

        most_ordered = collections.Counter(order_combinations).most_common()
        result += [ k for k, v in most_ordered if v > 1 and v == most_ordered[0][1] ]

    return [ ''.join(v) for v in sorted(result) ]

ê°€ì¥ ìµœì†Œì¸ ë…€ì„ì„ ê³„ì†í•´ì„œ ë½‘ì•„ì•¼ í•˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— heap êµ¬ì¡°ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆë‹¤. ì´ ë•Œ pythonìœ¼ë¡œ ì½”ë”©ì„ í•˜ë ¤í•œë‹¤ë©´ ë¬´ì¡°ê±´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ heapqë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ê²ƒ. priorityQueueëŠ” ì†ë„ê°€ ë„ˆë¬´ ëŠë ¤ì„œ íš¨ìœ¨ì„± í†µê³¼ë¥¼ í•˜ì§€ ëª»í•œë‹¤.

import heapq
def solution(scoville, K):
    # ê°€ì¥ ì‘ì€ ì›ì†Œë¥¼ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¨ë‹¤
    #   ê·¸ ë…€ì„ì´ Kë³´ë‹¤ í°ì§€ íŒŒì•…í•œë‹¤.
    # ì•„ë‹ˆë©´
    #   ê·¸ ë‹¤ìŒ ì›ì†Œë¥¼ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¨ë‹¤
    #   ì„ëŠ”ë‹¤.
    #   ì„ì€ íšŸìˆ˜ 1ì¶”ê°€í•œë‹¤.
    #   ë‹¤ì‹œ ë„£ëŠ”ë‹¤.
    # ë°˜ë³µí•œë‹¤.
    q = scoville[:]
    heapq.heapify(q)
    count = 0
    while q[0] < K and len(q) > 1: # ì œì¼ ì‘ì€ ì›ì†Œê°€ Kë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ê³  ë“¤ì–´ê°„ ê°œìˆ˜ëŠ” 2ì´ìƒì´ë©´ ì§„í–‰
        a = heapq.heappop(q)
        b = heapq.heappop(q)
        c = a + b * 2
        heapq.heappush(q, c)
        count += 1
    
    if q[0] >= K:
        return count
    else:
        return -1

collection

import collections
import itertools

def solution(orders, course):
    result = []

    for course_size in course:
        order_combinations = []
        for order in orders:
            order_combinations += itertools.combinations(sorted(order), course_size)

        most_ordered = collections.Counter(order_combinations).most_common()
        result += [ k for k, v in most_ordered if v > 1 and v == most_ordered[0][1] ]

    return [ ''.join(v) for v in sorted(result) ]

BFS

from collections import deque
def solution(maps):
    answer = 0
    
    d = [[0, 1], [-1, 0], [0, -1], [1, 0]]
    n, m = len(maps), len(maps[0])
    visited = [[-1 for col in range(m)] for row in range(n)]
    
    q = deque()
    q.append([0, 0])
    visited[0][0] = 1
    while q:
        [y, x] = q.popleft()
        for i in range(4):
            ny, nx = y + d[i][0], x + d[i][1]
            if 0 <= ny < n and 0 <= nx < m:
                if maps[ny][nx] == 1 and visited[ny][nx] == -1:
                    visited[ny][nx] = visited[y][x] + 1
                    q.append([ny, nx])
    
    return visited[-1][-1]

int N;

    cout.tie(NULL);

        cout << "value : " << a[i] << '\n';

            cout << "    ì˜¤í°ìˆ˜ í›„ë³´ ë°œê²¬, ë‹µì•ˆ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸" << '\n';
            cout << "    stack before" << '\n' << "    ";

            cout << "    answer before" << '\n' << "    ";
            for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                cout << v[j] << " ";
            }cout << '\n';
            
            v[s.back()] = a[i];
            s.pop_back();
            
            cout << "    stack after" << '\n' << "    ";
            for (int j = 0; j < s.size(); j++) {
                cout << s[j] << " ";
            }cout << '\n';
            cout << "    answer after" << '\n' << "    ";
            for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
                cout << v[j] << " ";
            }cout << '\n';
        }
        s.push_back(i);
        cout << "stack í˜„ì¬ ìƒíƒœ" << '\n';
        for (int j = 0; j < s.size(); j++) {
            cout << s[j] << " ";
        }cout << '\n' << '\n';
        
    }
    
    while (!s.empty()) {
        v[s.back()] = -1;
        s.pop_back();
    }

        cout << v[i] << " ";
    }

    return 0;
}

ë§Œì•½, ê°ê°ì˜ ë…¸ë“œì—ì„œ dfsë¥¼ í†µí•´ ê°’ì„ êµ¬í•œë‹¤ë©´, $O(V(V+E))$ ì •ë„ì˜ ì‹œê°„ ë³µì¡ë„ê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ê³ , Vê°€ 100,000ì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ë¶ˆê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤. ìœ„ì˜ ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§„í–‰í•  ê²½ìš°, $O(V)$ ë§Œì— íƒìƒ‰ì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.

Code

//
//  main.cpp
//  algorithm_prac
//
//  Created by ìµœì™„ì‹ on 2021/04/05.
//
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
typedef long long ll;

using namespace std;
vector<pair<int, int>> graph[100001];
bool visited[100001];
ll maxDist = 0;
int maxIndex = 0;

void dfs(int node, int cost){
    
    if (maxDist < cost) {
        maxDist = cost;
        maxIndex = node;
    }
    
    visited[node] = true;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < graph[node].size(); i++) {
        int nextNode = graph[node][i].first;
        int weight = graph[node][i].second;
        
        if (visited[nextNode]) continue;
        
        dfs(nextNode, cost+weight);
    }
}

int main(){
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int a, b, c;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> a;
        while (true) {
            cin >> b;
            if (b < 0) break;
            cin >> c;
            graph[a].push_back(make_pair(b, c));
        }
    }
    
    dfs(1, 0); // ì–´ëŠ ì ì—ì„œ ì¶œë°œí•´ë„ ìƒê´€ ì—†ìŒ. 1ë²ˆ ë…¸ë“œëŠ” ë¬´ì¡°ê±´ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤.
    
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
        visited[i] = false;
    }
    maxDist = 0;
    dfs(maxIndex, 0);
    
    cout << maxDist << '\n';
    return 0;
}

item.title: [Algorithm Problem Solving] ë°±ì¤€(2512ë²ˆ): ì˜ˆì‚°
item.description:
ì‹¤ë²„3 : ì´ì§„ íƒìƒ‰ ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.

í’€ì´

ì˜ˆì‚° ê¸ˆì•¡ì€ ìµœëŒ€ì˜ˆì‚°ê³¼ ì•„ì˜ˆ ì•ˆì£¼ëŠ”(0ì›) ë°©ë²•ì´ ìˆë‹¤. ë”°ë¼ì„œ 0ê³¼ maxê¸ˆì•¡ì„ ì–‘ ëìœ¼ë¡œ ì¡ëŠ”ë‹¤.

left right mid ì˜ˆì‚°ì†Œëª¨ê¸ˆì•¡ í›„ë³´ê°€ëŠ¥ì—¬ë¶€
0 150 75 300 O
75 150 112 446 O
113 150 131 492 X
113 130 121 472 O
122 130 126 482 O
126 129 127 484 O
128 129 128 486 X

midê°€ më³´ë‹¤ ì‘ìœ¼ë©´ ë‹µì˜ í›„ë³´ë¼ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. íƒìƒ‰ì€ í•˜ë˜, ë‹µì¸ ìƒí™©ë§Œ ì˜ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ë©´ ë¨.

Code

//
//  main.cpp
//  algorithm_prac
//
//  Created by ìµœì™„ì‹ on 2021/04/05.
//

#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
int req[10001];



bool comp(int a, int b){
    return a<b;
}

int main(){
    int n, total = 0;
    ll m = 0;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> req[i];
        total += req[i];
    }
    cin >> m;
    
    sort(req, req+n, comp);
    
    if (total < m) {
        cout << req[n-1] << '\n';
        return 0;
    }
    
    int left = 0, right = req[n-1];
    int ans = 0;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = (left+right)/2;
        ll sum = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (mid < req[i]) sum += mid;
            else sum += req[i];
        }
        if (sum > m) {
            right = mid-1;
        } else {
            ans = mid;
            left = mid+1;
        }
    }
    
    cout << ans << '\n';
    return 0;
}

item.title: [Algorithm Problem Solving] ë°±ì¤€(9251ë²ˆ): LCS
item.description:
ê³¨ë“œ5 : ë™ì ê³„íšë²• ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.

í’€ì´

dp[i][j] = (i, j)ë²ˆì§¸ ìˆ˜ì—´ì˜ ì›ì†Œë¥¼ í¬í•¨í–ˆì„ ë•Œ, ê°€ì§€ëŠ” ìµœì¥ ìˆ˜ì—´ì˜ ê¸¸ì´

dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j-1]~dp[0][0])

í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì‹¤ì œ êµ¬í˜„ì„ ì´ëŸ°ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ë©´, $O(n^4)$ ë¡œ ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ê°€ ë‚  ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ë”°ë¼ì„œ ië²ˆì§¸ ì›ì†Œë¥¼ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ í•œ ì´í›„ì—, dpì˜ ê°’ì´ ì‚¬ìš©ì´ ë˜ëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸í•  í•„ìš”ê°€ ìˆë‹¤.

ë¬´ì¡°ê±´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ì „ ì›ì†Œ(i)ë¥¼ ë³¸ ë’¤ì—ëŠ” ê°’ì´ í° ìƒíƒœë¡œ ìœ ì§€ë˜ë©°, ë‹¤ìŒ ìƒíƒœì˜ ìµœì¥ ê¸¸ì´ëŠ” ì´ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œë¶€í„° ë„ì¶œë  ìˆ˜ ë°–ì— ì—†ë‹¤. ë”°ë¼ì„œ ìµœì í™”ê°€ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤.

Code


#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int dp[1001] = {0,};

int main(){
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
        int temp[1001];
        for (int j = 0; j < b.size(); j++) {
            temp[j] = dp[j];
        }
        for (int j = 0; j < b.size(); j++) {
            if (a[i] == b[j]) {
                int maxvalue = 0;
                for (int k = 0; k < j; k++) {
                    if (temp[k] > maxvalue) {
                        maxvalue = temp[k];
                    }
                }
                
                dp[j] = maxvalue+1;
                
            }
        }
//        for (int k = 0; k < b.size(); k++) {
//            cout << dp[k] << " ";
//        }
//        cout << '\n';
    }
    
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) {
        if (ans < dp[i]) {
            ans = dp[i];
        }
    }
    
    cout << ans << '\n';
    return 0;
}

//        }cout << "  ";
//        for (int j = 1; j <= M; j++) {
//            cout << visited[i][j][1] << " ";
//        }cout << '\n';
//    }
//}

int main(){
    cin >> N >> M;
    char temp[1001];
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
        cin >> temp;
        for (int j = 1; j <= M; j++) {
            graph[i][j] = temp[j-1] - '0';
        }
    }
    
        
    queue<state> q;
    int ans = -1;
    state s = {1, 1, 1};
    visited[1][1][1] = 1;
    q.push(s);
    
    
    while (!q.empty()) {
        
        
        state s = q.front();
        q.pop();
        
//        PPP();
        
        // íƒìƒ‰í•˜ë‹¤ê°€ (N,M)ì— ê°€ì¥ ë¨¼ì € ë„ì°©í•˜ë©´ ê·¸ë•Œì˜ ì´ë™ê±°ë¦¬ê°€ ìµœë‹¨ê±°ë¦¬ì´ë‹¤.
        if (s.y == N && s.x == M) {
            ans = visited[N][M][s.blockNum];
            break;
        }
        
        
        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            int next_y = s.y + dy[i], next_x = s.x + dx[i];
            // mapì•ˆì— ìˆëŠ”ê°€?
            if (isIn(next_y, next_x)) {
                // ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ˆìˆ˜ ìˆê³  ë°©ë¬¸í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë‹¤ë©´ -> ë‚´ blocknum ìƒíƒœ
                if (graph[next_y][next_x] == 0 && visited[next_y][next_x][s.blockNum] == 0) {
                    visited[next_y][next_x][s.blockNum] = visited[s.y][s.x][s.blockNum] + 1;
                    state sp = {next_y, next_x, s.blockNum};
                    q.push(sp);
                }
                // ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ˆìˆ˜ ì—†ì§€ë§Œ ì•„ì§ ë²½ì„ ëš«ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë‹¤ë©´
                if (graph[next_y][next_x] == 1 && s.blockNum){
                    visited[next_y][next_x][s.blockNum-1] =  visited[s.y][s.x][s.blockNum] + 1;
                    state sp = {next_y, next_x, s.blockNum-1};
                    q.push(sp);
                }
                // ë‚˜ë¨¸ì§€ ê²½ìš°ëŠ” íƒìƒ‰í•  í•„ìš”ê°€ ì—†ë‹¤.
                    // ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ˆìˆ˜ ìˆì§€ë§Œ ë°©ë¬¸í–ˆë‹¤ë©´ -> ë°©ë¬¸í•œ ë…€ì„ì€ ë³¼í•„ìš” ì—†ë‹¤.
                    // ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ˆìˆ˜ ì—†ì§€ë§Œ ë²½ì„ì´ë¯¸ ëš«ì—ˆë‹¤ -> ë°©ë¬¸ ë¶ˆê°€ëŠ¥
            }
        }
    }
    cout << ans << '\n';
    
    return 0;
}

item.description:
ì‹¤ë²„1 : êµ¬í˜„ ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.

ë„ˆë¬´ ì§œì¦ë‚œë‹¤. ë¬¸ì œ ì œëŒ€ë¡œ ì½ì–´. ì œë°œì œë°œì ­ë¼..

  1. ë±€ì´ ì§€ë‚˜ê°€ëŠ” ê²½ë¡œë¥¼ ì¡ì•„ì¤„ ìë£Œêµ¬ì¡°
    1. mapì— í‘œì‹œí•´ì„œ ê°ˆ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ”ì§€ ì—†ëŠ”ì§€ ì•Œì•„ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
    2. tailì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜ë¥¼ trackingí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. -> queue
  2. ì‹œê°„
  3. í˜„ì¬ ë³´ê³  ìˆëŠ” ë°©í–¥
  4. ë°©í–¥ì— ë”°ë¥¸ ìš°íšŒì „ ì¢ŒíšŒì „
  5. actionì„ ì•Œë ¤ì¤„ ë°©í–¥

Code

//
//  main.cpp
//  algorithm_prac
//
//  Created by ìµœì™„ì‹ on 2021/04/05.
//

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int N;
int map[64][64];
vector<char> ans;

void go(int sy, int sx, int d){
    int setN = map[sy][sx];
    int flag = 0;
    for (int i = sy; i < sy+d; i++) {
        for (int j = sx; j < sx+d; j++) {
            if (setN != map[i][j]) {
                flag = -1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (flag == -1) break;
    }
    
    if (flag == 0) ans.push_back(setN + '0');
    else {
        ans.push_back('(');
        
        go(sy, sx, d/2);
        go(sy, sx+d/2, d/2);
        go(sy+d/2, sx, d/2);
        go(sy+d/2, sx+d/2, d/2);
        
        ans.push_back(')');
    }
}

int main(){
    cin >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        char temp[64];
        cin >> temp;
        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
            map[i][j] = temp[j] - '0';
        }
    }

    go(0, 0, N);
    for (int i = 0; i < int(ans.size()); i++) {
        cout << ans[i];
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: [Algorithm Problem Solving] ë°±ì¤€(1992ë²ˆ): ì¿¼ë“œíŠ¸ë¦¬
item.description:
ì‹¤ë²„1 : ë¶„í• ì •ë³µ ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.

ì²˜ìŒì— ë„ˆë¬´ ì‚½ì§ˆí–ˆë‹¤.. ê·¸ëƒ¥ êµ¬ì¡°ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¶€ì¡±í•œ ê²ƒ ê°™ë‹¤.

Code

//
//  main.cpp
//  algorithm_prac
//
//  Created by ìµœì™„ì‹ on 2021/04/05.
//

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int N;
int map[64][64];
vector<char> ans;

void go(int sy, int sx, int d){
    int setN = map[sy][sx];
    int flag = 0;
    for (int i = sy; i < sy+d; i++) {
        for (int j = sx; j < sx+d; j++) {
            if (setN != map[i][j]) {
                flag = -1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (flag == -1) break;
    }
    
    if (flag == 0) ans.push_back(setN + '0');
    else {
        ans.push_back('(');
        
        go(sy, sx, d/2);
        go(sy, sx+d/2, d/2);
        go(sy+d/2, sx, d/2);
        go(sy+d/2, sx+d/2, d/2);
        
        ans.push_back(')');
    }
}

int main(){
    cin >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        char temp[64];
        cin >> temp;
        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
            map[i][j] = temp[j] - '0';
        }
    }

    go(0, 0, N);
    for (int i = 0; i < int(ans.size()); i++) {
        cout << ans[i];
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: [Algorithm Problem Solving] ë°±ì¤€(2565ë²ˆ): ì „ê¹ƒì¤„
item.description:
ì‹¤ë²„1 : ë™ì ê³„íšë²• ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.

max_element ìµœëŒ€í•œ ì“°ì§€ ë§ì. ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  sizeofëŠ” ë°”ì´íŠ¸ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë¦¬í„´í•´ì¤€ë‹¤. ì œë°œ..ã… ã… 

Code1

dp[n] = në²ˆì§¸ ì „ê¹ƒì¤„ì„ í¬í•¨í•œ ìƒíƒœë¡œ ê°€ì§ˆ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ìµœëŒ€ ì „ê¹ƒì¤„ ê°¯ìˆ˜

dp[n] = max(dp[1~n-1] + 1)


#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int N;
int M = 0;
int map[501] = {0,};
int dp[501] = {0,};
int ans = -1;

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    
    cin >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        int a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        map[a] = b;
        dp[a] = 1;
        
        M = max(M, a);
    }
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= M; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {
            if (map[i] < map[j] || dp[i] == 0) {
                continue;
            } else {
                if (dp[i] < dp[j]+1) {
                    dp[i] = dp[j]+1;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    for (int i = 0; i <= M; i++) {
        ans = max(ans, dp[i]);
    }
    cout << N-ans << '\n';
    return 0;
}

ê°€ì¥ ê¸´ ì¦ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ë¶€ë¶„ ìˆ˜ì—´(LIS)ë¡œ í’€ ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆë‹¤. ì˜ˆì „ì— ê³ ë“±í•™êµ ë•Œ í•¨ìˆ˜ ê°œìˆ˜ ì°¾ëŠ” ë¬¸ì œê°€ ìˆë‹¤. ì¹˜ì—­ ë¶€ë¶„ì—ì„œ ì •ì˜ì—­ ì›ì†Œë§Œí¼ì˜ ê°œìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë½‘ì•„ì£¼ê²Œë˜ë©´ ìì—°ìŠ¤ë ˆ ì›í•˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì§„ë‹¤. ì•½ê°„ ê·¸ ëŠë‚Œê³¼ ë¹„ìŠ·í•œë°, í•´ë‹¹ ëª¨ì–‘ì—ì„œ ë‹µì¸ ìƒí™©ì€ 1 4 6 7 10 ë˜ëŠ” 2 4 6 7 10 ê³¼ ê°™ì€ ìƒí™©ì´ë‹¤. íŠ¹ì§•ì„ ì‚´í´ë³´ë©´ ê°’ì´ ì¦ê°€í•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤. ê°ê°ì˜ A ì „ë´‡ëŒ€ì—ì„œ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ëŠ” B ê°’ë“¤ ì¤‘ì—ì„œ ì¦ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ìˆ˜ì—´ ì¤‘ ê°€ì¥ ê¸´ ê²ƒì„ ì°¾ëŠ”ë‹¤ë©´, ê·¸ê²ƒì´ ìµœëŒ€ ì „ê¹ƒì¤„ì˜ ê°œìˆ˜ì¼ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.


#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int N;
int dp[101];
vector<pair<int, int>> input;

bool compare(pair<int, int> a, pair<int, int> b){
    return a.first < b.first;
}
int main(){
    cin >> N;
    input.push_back(make_pair(0, 0));
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) dp[i] = 1;

    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        int a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        input.push_back(make_pair(a, b));
    }
    sort(input.begin(), input.end(), compare);
    
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {
            if (input[i].second > input[j].second) {
                dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[j]+1);
            }
        }
    }
    int ans = -1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
        ans = max(ans, dp[i]);
    }
    cout << N-ans << '\n';
    
    return 0;
}
